read_bismark

Contents

  • read_bismark_batches()

read_bismark#

read_bismark.read_bismark_batches(file, genome, flank_windows=500, gene_windows=2000, batch_size=1000000, cpu=4)#

Method to read Bismark genomeWide cytosine report

Parameters:

  • cpu (int) – How many cores to use. Uses every physical core by default

  • file (str) – path to bismark genomeWide report

  • genome (DataFrame) – polars.Dataframe with gene ranges

  • flank_windows (int) – Number of windows flank regions to split

  • gene_windows (int) – Number of windows gene regions to split

  • batch_size (int) – Number of rows to read by one CPU core

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

polars.Dataframe with windowed cytosine report with columns
[<chr>, <strand>, <start>, <context>, <fragment>, <density>]
(density = count_methylated / count_unmethylated)
